CustomField.description: Opportunities only generate accounting data if their record type is listed here. If no record types are defined, all Opportunities generate accounting data. Semicolon-delimited, API names only. Case-sensitive.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Opportunities only generate accounting data if their record type is listed here. If no record types are defined, all Opportunities generate accounting data.
CustomField.label: Accounting Data Record Type Filter
